Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Party of 5. Not a great place for larger groups, but a fantastic restaurant nonetheless. Service was friendly and competent. Prices are very reasonable. The food was delicious!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Portions are large and prices are fair. On top of that food is delicious. One of the best Italian restaurants in this area.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Very good prices for pasta, loved the variety and options to make your own combination.  Portions are quite generous on top of free bread and olive oil dip. We also had a large napolitana pizza for take out and it was bigger than we …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Had a delicious dinner with my niece attending UMass while visiting with my nephew.  She had never been but took a recommendation. Service,food,and atmosphere where all generous and pleasant to the palate.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Pasta E Basta exceeded every expectation! My partner and I have been searching desperately for an Italian restaurant that can accommodate both my tomato and nut allergy. The Spicy Alfredo sauce is addicting, as well as the bread and dipping …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The service was great. The bread before the meal was outstanding. Like, yeah, bread and oil, okay... But there was something about it that was completely next level. The appetiser was pretty good. The pastas we're all cooked perfectly, …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Came here for a date with my girlfriend for her birthday. We were excited to try the place out and eat some pasta. Tried some of the calamari and arancini for appetizers. Definitely recommend the calamari, we ordered ours spicy which …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Fantastic pasta, fantastic dining experience. Been twice now and enjoyed both times. Service is friendly, the marinara sauce is very good, at its a great place for a sit down meal w family or a date

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: My wife and I have been going here for 14 years. We have never been disappointed with the food or the service. We live a considerable distance away, but always look forward to spending some time around Amherst and dinner at Pasta E Basta is always in the plan. Crazy Alfredo is unique and incredible.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Good portions, decent price. Slow to make the food. Nice servers. Ceasae salad dressing was too sweet and tangy. Wish they used anchovy dressing.  The Fruti di marre was $17 and pasta portion was small compared to other dishes. The big …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Waited in total about 2 hours. 3 of us got our food an hour into waiting. They forgot the other TWO people at all our tables food so then we had to wait another 45 mins while we ate our food while they had nothing. Was absolutely the worst dinning experience  I have ever had in my life.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Very good Italian food with some unique dishes. Prices were very reasonable for food quality. Emma was an excellent waitress

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Took my Family out for Mother's Day, first time here and definitely won't be the last. Food was Incredible!! Everyone at the Table was raving about the food and service, even hours after we left. Highly recommend the Sweet and Spicy Alfredo.. Best I've had!! Thanks for a wonderful Experience!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Have not been in a while...forgot how good the food was! Great prices.  Arancini was so good and the chicken picatta was delish.  Will not wait another year to go back.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great fast service. Food was great. The bread was AWESOME! We ate down stairs so I don't know what the upstairs was like but the down stairs is great for good in and out food.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Only reason I’m giving it a four and not a five is because the takeout portion was SO small. Been there several times and have always gotten the same dish. Ordered two of the Lobster Alla Marre to go and it was like they split one portion …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I made reservations at the Pasta E  Basta restaurant in Amherst, Massachusetts, for my Mother's Day dinner after my brother raved about their food.  I was not disappointed. The atmosphere was friendly and welcoming, and the exposed brick of …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: From the homemade focaccia to the amazing staff and great entree offerings, this is the place to eat when in Amherst.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great food, experienced staff, reasonable prices.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The wait staff is absolutely amazing. Pizza is some of the best I've had.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The food was amazing. You do have to climb a ton of stairs to get to the tables but I guess work out before you eat lol.  The price is good also.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The service was consistent.  The food is very good.  Their house bread is amazing, similar to focaccia, but lighter.  I was a little disappointed in the size of the cocktail.  The glass was fine but it was only 3/4 full.  The staircase to …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Terrible service staff. Asked for refills for sodas, bread, extra sauce, all never came. Had to ask the food runner to bring it. Was told the pizza I ordered to go looked so good if saving for later don't open the box. To preserve it. …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I have been going to Pasta E Basta for a long time and they never seam to disappoint. This meal was great and tasted good as always in well packaged manner. I will absolutely be eating here again during the pandemic and so should you!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I've had their Porcini mushroom ravioli with a vodka cream sauce. This was really good, albeit a little heavy due to the cheese. I've also had the same ravioli with a marinara sauce. This was good also, and much lighter than before. But …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Everything was awesome. Food, service, portions, drinks, management, prices. I highly recommend this place. Can't wait to go back!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Wonderful food and atmosphere. Large portions for a reasonable price. Wait staff was friendly and attentive. Great menu choices for both a large or small bite to eat. It was my first time eating here but it certainly won't be my last. Great …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text:
Great customer service, good flavor pasta.
Ordered shrimp broccoli spaghetti with garlic for dinner. It tasted great but I felt something sandy every other bite.  I thought that was grinded black pepper …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Joined my son for lunch, I was pleasantly surprised at the service and most of all the pasta dishes we had where phenomenal. I have had the pleasure of enjoying Italian food at some of the top rated places in the country, but  this is some …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great, quick service. We sat upstairs.  Full dining room experience upstairs.  The food was amazing!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text:
We got a family chicken parmigiana dinner, pizza, and grilled veggies—generous servings and delicious!
Thanks to the great employee who helped me get all this to my car.  So appreciated!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I had my wedding dinner here, and they were incredible. The "family style" serving worked great for our party of 25+, and everybody was so impressed with how good the food was. …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Ordered the crazy Alfredo my girlfriend ordered the lobster almar the food was absolutely amazing it came out quickly. The only thing I didn't like was it was served in a bowl that was easy to fix I asked them for a plate and they accommodated

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great service! Nice atmosphere, from the music to the friendly staff, all around great experience. First time there, and definitely won't be my last. The Arancini, was delectable! Had the Veal Parmigiana, was supreme. Also couldn't get …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I has been in this restaurant a lot. First the service always has been with excellent service. The restaurant very clean, nice and comfortable atmosphere to go there with friends and family. And the most important the food the pasta and the …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I love this place.  I came here graduation weekend and the place was very busy.  We still got our food very quickly and the service was great.  I will always come back.  I recommend the vodka sauce but the rest of the family enjoys the alfredo.  Save some of the bread to dip on the sauce.  Take out is a good option too.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great pasta choices, I had the build your own pasta dish, opting for broccoli alfredo. We ate in the casual downstairs dining room on a previous visit. The menu is similar if not identical and the main difference I saw was that seating is less crowded upstairs.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great service, great food! Sat on the second floor and had really nice views out into downtown Amherst. My friends and I all ordered different pasta dishes and they were all excellent

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: We ate here (upstairs) for the first time to celebrate our son's 21st birthday.  He is a UMASS student who loves Italian food and eats here regularly.   The food and ambiance were excellent!  The menu has a wide  range of options and the …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Have been going there past 24 years but the past several years the food quality and preparation has suffered. My eggplant parmigiana was heaped with mozzarella cheese and there was very little eggplant to be found. Service is fair albeit …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: By far my favorite place to eat! The first time I went was a Tuesday afternoon and my date and I were the only ones there. They were so nice and the food was amazing! The second time was quite busy, but they still treated us like we were …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Amazing food! My husband eat here or get take out almost every week, we can’t help ourselves! Our favorite is the sweet and spicy Alfredo!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great Service  Food is excellent and the Owners and Staff treat you like Family..

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I love their menu option to "make your own pasta" - it allows me to try something different every time! I've enjoyed my meals here both times I went.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Very easy online ordering. Pickup was also very easy. Staff was friendly and food was fresh, hot and delicious. Will order again!!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Really good food and really good service. Good place to stop by and try something.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Y'all the food here is THE BEST.. I have tried many options on this menu but I SWEAR my favorite is the alfredo... SOO yummy and not even that expensive! I think everyone needs to try the food and the owners are just the sweetest!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great fresh flavors made with fresh ingredients.  Excellent value for such high quality food. I highly recommend eating here.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The restaurant is in a great location. Right across a nice park with a convenient parking lot across from the restaurant. Inside the atmosphere is nice and has a Mediterranean feel to it. The food and service are great with the prices being equal to the size of the food served. Definitely will be coming back. PS from Agawam

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Been 3 times now and every single time the food was incredible! Only flaw is the service is below average. But if you’re looking for fantastic Italian food you will leave very full and happy.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I ate here last night, and was blown away.  I got grilled shrimp and my companion got grilled rosemary chicken; both came with assorted grilled vegetables and salad. In my experience, simple preparations like this can be just terrible if …

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Cocktails were fairly priced and well made. The bread was the most amazing with thr basil and oil dip, the food was quick and delicious. I sat on the 2nd floor and the view of the town common was delightful. Highly recommended for a date night. 2 people can have fine dining and drinka for under $60.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: My experience was phenomenal. The appetizers were delicious. The calamari wasn’t  oily and the mussels were seasoned very well. And the pasta was amazing!!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Large portions and convenient location are the big plus points for this italian (fine dining joint) restaurant.  The food is decent although I have not encountered a dish yet that has impressed me.  The staff is friendly.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: EXCELLANT SERVICE, EXCELLENT FOOD!! Worth the trip from Connecticut!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: What a delightful place.  Staff was great.  The food was delicious.  We had a party of 11 and there was a party of 12 next to us and everything came out perfectly.  I highly suggest the arancini appetizer. Everyone was pleased with their portions.  Will definitely go back!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Exceptional food every time.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Excellent food at good prices. We ate at the ground level restaurant which is cafeteria style (probably mostly take out), but the food was great. I've will definitely go back.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Excellent food. Fair warning though, they have large servings! So might want to consider sharing if you're used to smaller portions. Personally, I looooved their shrimp!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Excellent meal as always, great service.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Very generous portions for the price. Delicious veg options. Beautiful, cozy place with great views. Very good ambience. Quick service. Highly recommend it!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Little hidden authentic Italian gem! Amazing food, excellent service. Happy to have stumbled across this place after my hour walk on the way to my hotel. Very reasonable prices.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Beware of hidden and sneaky charges, leaves a bad taste in mouth, metaphorically too.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: 5 stars for quality, prices and service....

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great food and service....as always.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: First time, loved the fresh bread and oil. Service on point. Everyone very helpful and kind. Will be back. Chicken parm with broccoli no pasta made very well.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Never had a poor experience here. This is the place to go if you want good Italian and great atmosphere. Date night recommendation is to get a seat on the top level by the window. Especially in the winter time when the tree in the town green is lit up.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great pasta, great drinks. The Chicken Parm is a must, but don't be afraid to explore! A true classic of downtown Amherst.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Tasty food but very uneven service.  I cannot digest onions or more than a bit of garlic. Told server this.  Salad came covered in onions and wine sauce had too much garlic.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: A very no-frills, somewhat unique, more than just spaghetti and meatballs establishment. The food is tasty and reasonably priced; the portions are fairly generous.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: This place has great food which comes in huge portions, so come very hungry but also very patient because if you're sitting upstairs you could be in for a wait. It's not a fancy place but I probably wouldn't go wearing sweatpants either.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great little place in a nice location in Amherst. Food is delicious and service was great! Look forward to eating there in the future!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Down home "Italian" food. I wouldn't say it's authentic or a culinary gem, but really it can hit the spot. Have never had anything less than delicious, always leave full and with leftovers.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Fantastic experience. Great Italian food. The meatballs were fresh. Everything prepared had a homestyle taste to it. Will definitely be back

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Excellent service and delicious food.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Really good pasta. Try the crazy alfredo

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: First time here, is an awesome cozy dining spot. With amazing food starting from the bread to the entrees. Definitely recommend.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I look forward for the bread basket and the home olive oil dip, my entree is the crazy alfado. They have multiple floors over all its a great place to eat for lunch and dinner.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Nice place to go for anyone who likes Italian food. Food was good quality and service was good. Was fortunate to get a window seat on one of the higher floors.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The greatest restaurant in existence. Service is great can be a little slow sometimes. It's worth it. If you're in a rush, take out downstairs is a little faster.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The appetizer is my favorite ever. The "crazy alfredo" is delicious. Atmosphere is like no other. Will go back.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: My all time favorite restaurant! Delicious Italian fare.....house made bread and dipping oil are given to every table! Amazing gnocchi!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: The sweet and spicy Alfredo is out of this world!! The sauce is the best part

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great place to get some pasta. Price is ok but the portions huge. It probably serves two people. Thus, great value.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text:
Decent food
decent staff
just mediocre.
Parking isn't the best.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Great food, nice setting. Our house and wait staff were polite and helpful. Highly recommend an evening here

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Takeout experience is quick and easy, food tastes incredible every time. Addition of bread is also a plus.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: They were so nice. Great pasta. Great basta. Great catering. Offered to drive us to our venue if we couldn't get an uber. Lit.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Delicious Italian food that is inexpensive and has large servings. The free bread refills are wonderful as well.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Absolutely wonderful food, service, and patio. Highly recommend and will certainly be back.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Wonderful Italian food,  restful atmosphere,  reasonable prices and friendly staff make this restaurant a must visit when in Amherst.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Amazing food, and a somewhat reasonable price considering it's in the heart of Amherst. It can take a while to be served but it's worth it!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: I had chicken marsala there. It was really nice. I think I should mention the ginger bread. It's too good.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere with great food.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Excellent Italian cuisine with fresh salads, perfect pastas, sauces, and create-your-own options that will keep your imagination alive. A downtown treasure!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Beautiful atmosphere and great food, I can’t wait to come back!

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Had my first date here with my now husband and it is one of our old favorites. Cute little Italian place with delicious food.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: It wasn't bad, but the vodka sauce is not vodka sauce. Also the marinara was sub par. For a place with pasta in the name, not impressed.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: Bread and atmosphere is amazing! But the red sauce is not my cup of tea and the service/ wait could improve.

Name: Pasta e Basta
Review Text: A superb chicken parmesan meal. Get it with meatballs if you are feeling extra sweaty. Don’t forget to say hi to Eduardo

Review Text:
